editorialNotes.standard: You might get stuck the first time you play Gorogoa. But once the gears of your brain settle into the right configurations, youâ€™ll see how smart this mix of art and perspective really is. Layers pile upon layers, doors transport you between realities, strange creatures and wild environments blend together into a fascinating interactive collage youâ€™ll want to peel apart to discover what lies underneath.

editorialNotes.standard: Limbo is a gripping blend of stark, haunting landscapes, bizarre characters and unsettling sounds. With clever puzzle design, an intriguing narrative and an excellent touch-screen control system, itâ€™s as rewarding to play as it is interesting to look at and listen to.
editorialNotes.short: Dark, haunting, beautiful. This'll stay with you long after it's over.

editorialNotes.standard: We couldnâ€™t wait to go back to the land of twisty towers and uncanny beautyâ€”and this sequel didnâ€™t let us down. With its striking colours and level design, itâ€™s even more stunning than the first game. New elements like light beams and controlling two characters make the puzzles even trickier. The bond between that mother and child is what weâ€™ll remember most, thoughâ€”their relationship moved us in a way few games do.
editorialNotes.short: An unforgettable adventure full of challenging puzzles and gorgeous visuals.

editorialNotes.standard: Mesmerising from start to finish, Monument Valley offers a world of uncanny beauty and constant wonder. To help a princess proceed on her mysterious quest, youâ€™ll face ingenious puzzles that involve lifting and spinning the environment in seemingly impossible ways. Itâ€™s a mind-bending journey filled with the joy of discovery, making Ustwoâ€™s adventure a must-play for gamers of every experience level.

editorialNotes.standard: Now hereâ€™s how you build a sequel! With The Room Three, Fireproof Games kept everything we love about this seriesâ€”its chilling atmosphere, mind-bending puzzles and beautiful visualsâ€”while making masterful enhancements. The story continues with trials set by a creepy new nemesis, The Craftsman. As you explore huge areas and tiny ones, the challenges feel increasingly epic, and a better-than-ever hint system ensures that finding solutions is super-rewarding.
With relaxed swapping rules and charming graphics, this surprisingly slick match-3 puzzler makes the genre feel fresh again.

editorialNotes.standard: A fascinating reinvention of a longtime videogame franchise, Hitman GO takes familiar elements of stealth and assassination and reinterprets them as a wondrously stylised, turn-based boardgame. Each mission presents characters and scenesâ€”some from previous Hitman gamesâ€”as a sleek diorama, blending old and new to create an innovative experience. Even with helpful distractions and places to hide, inching toward your targets a step at a time demands keen strategy, and trying to pull off optional mission objectives quickly becomes an irresistible obsession.
Enigmatic settings and storytelling enrich the mysteries of Leonardo da Vinciâ€™s gadgetry in this escape room puzzle seriesâ€™ fantastic conclusion.

This absorbing puzzler is so minimalist thereâ€™s no start screen, no logos, no instructionsâ€”it just begins. We quickly got lost in the challenge of rearranging tiles, Rubikâ€™s Cubeâ€“style, so a single line runs through each pattern. Our advice: sort out the corners and other unique tiles first, then the rest will snap quickly into place.

editorialNotes.standard: Put a little â€œbooâ€ in your botany by concocting herbal remedies for odd supernatural ailments in this eerie puzzle-adventure.

When young astronaut Kosmo sees his robot girlfriend, Nova, blown to pieces before his eyes, he gallantly sets off across the galaxy to find his belovedâ€™s parts and put her back together. This beautiful and whimsical point-and-click adventure will steal your heart as you visit dozens of kooky planets and encounter everything from alien arcades to robot discos. Each unique world introduces adorable critters, fantastic sights, clever puzzles to solve and tokens of affection to discover. Star-crossed romance has never felt so rewarding.

editorialNotes.short: Discover a memorable story full of humour and charming characters.

editorialNotes.standard: Elegant but packed with personality, Zip Zap kept us happily tinkering for hours. To solve its deceptively tricky puzzles, youâ€™ll set Rube Goldbergâ€“style hinges and levers into motion with strategically timed taps. The bite-sized levels and one-finger controls make it perfect for quick escapes.
